text: Xavier Pujo (born 5 December 1977) is a retired French tennis player. Pujo has a career high ATP singles ranking of 279 achieved on 14 July 2003. He also has a career high doubles ranking of 342 achieved on 18 February 2008. Pujo has won 1 ATP Challenger doubles title at the 2007 Saint-Brieuc Challenger. ==Challenger finals== ===Doubles: 3 (1–2)=== {|class="sortable wikitable" !Result !class="unsortable"|W–L !Date !Tournament !Tier !Surface !Partner !Opponents !class="unsortable"|Score |- |bgcolor=98FB98|Win |1–0 | |style="background:moccasin;"|Saint-Brieuc Challenger, France |style="background:moccasin;"|Challenger |Clay | Jean-Baptiste Perlant | Jean- Christophe Faurel Jérôme Haehnel |2–6, 6–2, [10–7] |- |bgcolor=FFA07A|Loss |1–1 | |style="background:moccasin;"|Dresden Challenger, Germany |style="background:moccasin;"|Challenger |Clay | Jean-Baptiste Perlant | Tomas Behrend Christopher Kas |3–6, 4–6 |- |bgcolor=FFA07A|Loss |1–2 | |style="background:moccasin;"|Bordeaux Challenger, France |style="background:moccasin;"|Challenger |Clay | Stéphane Robert | Pablo Cuevas Horacio Zeballos |6–4, 4–6, [4–10] |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:French male tennis players Category:Sportspeople from Paris Category:Sportspeople from Bordeaux
